title: WE OFFER THEE THE HOLY MASS

sections.title: Verse 1
content: We offer Thee the holy Mass,
O Lord of earth and sky;

sections.title: Chorus
content: The bread and wine we bring to Thee,
Becoming Christ's own flesh and blood,

sections.title: Verse 2
content: This sacred gift we humbly give,
For all who live and die;
May all who share this holy feast
